problem_names: lemma PiE_mem2: "f \<in> S\<rightarrow>\<^sub>E T \<Longrightarrow> x \<in> S \<Longrightarrow> f x \<in> T"
lemma Pi_mem2: "f \<in> S\<rightarrow> T \<Longrightarrow> x \<in> S \<Longrightarrow> f x \<in> T"
translations: lemma PiE_mem2: "f \<in> S\<rightarrow>\<^sub>E T \<Longrightarrow> x \<in> S \<Longrightarrow> f x \<in> T"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>f \<in> S \<rightarrow>\<^sub>E T; x \<in> S\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> f x \<in> T

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>f \<in> (S \<rightarrow> T) \<inter> extensional S;
     x \<in> S\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> f x \<in> T
lemma Pi_mem2: "f \<in> S\<rightarrow> T \<Longrightarrow> x \<in> S \<Longrightarrow> f x \<in> T"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>f \<in> S \<rightarrow> T; x \<in> S\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> f x \<in> T

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>f \<in> {f. \<forall>x.
                            x \<in> S \<longrightarrow> f x \<in> T};
     x \<in> S\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> f x \<in> T
